ABOUT_ME

May 19th 1994 born in Varna, Bulgaria. Early on, I developed a passion to create. Getting my first computer was the turning point for my creativity. I spent hundreds of hours in Paint and Microsoft Office until, Photoshop entered my life in a form of a DVD with a pirated version of CS3. Everything else stopped, Photoshop was my life for the majority of my teen years, creating countless designs ranging from fictional company logos to websites and branding projects. During university and later jobs, that creative spirit was dormant, up until the "Pandemic Restart". I am back - ready to improve and create.

CREDITS

DESIGN

FIGMA = designing the website for desktop and mobile.

ADOBE® Photoshop = raster creation/editing and exporting web-friendly assets.

ADOBE® Illustrator = vector creation/editing and exporting web-friendly assets.

SUPPLY MONO™ = solid and versatile typeface by pangram pangram® inspired by industrial design and architecture. used under free license for personal use.

DEVELOPMENT

HTML/SCSS/JAVASCRIPT = developing the website, making it responsive/fluid, adding interactions and animations.

Visual Studio Code = my text editor of choice.

NodeJs/NPM = package installing, managing and version control.

Parcel = lightweight, fast bundler/builder alternative to WebPack.

GSAP = the animation library i used for all the animations, interactions and scroll triggers.

IMAGES LOADED.JS = a javascript library with callback functions when all images in a page are loaded.

split type.js = a javascript library that splits text into characters words or lines, for further animation using gsap

INSPIRATION

The Designer And The Grid - Lucienne Roberts.

Making and Breaking the Grid - Timothy Samara.

Grid Systems in Graphic Design - Josef Müller-Brockmann.

The New Typography - Jan Tschichold.

Typographie: A Manual of Design - Emil Ruder.
